alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hansford; Hutchinson; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:15PM CDT until July 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CARSON...HUTCHINSON...NORTHWESTERN GRAY...HANSFORD... WESTERN ROBERTS AND SOUTHWESTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Gruver to Pringle to 4 miles northwest of Borger to Fritch, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Borger, Spearman, Fritch, Stinnett, Gruver, Skellytown, Sanford, Morse, Farnsworth, Waka and Pringle. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Gray; Hansford; Hutchinson; Ochiltree; Roberts
